directions: In a large bowl, mix lemonade, crushed pineapple, and sweetened condensed milk.  Fold in whipped topping.  Pour filling into pie crust, and freeze. Serve frozen.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) deep dish pie crust, baked and cooled
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Lemonade Pie II
